metadata.title: CVE-2017-6437 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
The base64encode function in base64.c in libimobiledevice libplist 1.12allows local users to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via acrafted plist file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6437` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libplist++3v5 - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
libplist-utils - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
libplist3 - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
python-plist - 1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libplist package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12+git+1+e37ca00-0.3').
